Cepo 0.0.1
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Cepo: a method for differential stability analysis of scRNA-seq data
  • Changelog

Extract differential statistics from DX methods

getStats.Rd

Extract differential statistics from DX methods

getStats(object, returnDF = TRUE)

Arguments

object

a computed result from Cepo()
returnDF

Whether return a data.frame, default to TRUE.

Value

If returnDF is set to TRUE, then returns a data frame. Otherwise returns a list.

Examples

set.seed(1234)
n = 50 ## genes, rows
p = 100 ## cells, cols
exprsMat = matrix(rpois(n*p, lambda = 5), nrow = n)
rownames(exprsMat) = paste0("gene", 1:n)
colnames(exprsMat) = paste0("cell", 1:p)
cellTypes = sample(letters[1:3], size = p, replace = TRUE)

cepo_output = Cepo(exprsMat = exprsMat, cellTypes = cellTypes)
limma_output = doLimma(exprsMat = exprsMat, cellTypes = cellTypes)
voom_output = doVoom(exprsMat = exprsMat, cellTypes = cellTypes)
ttest_output = doTtest(exprsMat = exprsMat, cellTypes = cellTypes)
wilcoxon_output = doWilcoxon(exprsMat = exprsMat, cellTypes = cellTypes)

getStats(cepo_output)

#> DataFrame with 50 rows and 3 columns
#>                 a          b          c
#>         <numeric>  <numeric>  <numeric>
#> gene1  -0.3700980  0.0563725  0.3137255
#> gene10 -0.0808824 -0.1029412  0.1838235
#> gene11  0.2426471 -0.3088235  0.0661765
#> gene12  0.2965686 -0.2401961 -0.0563725
#> gene13  0.1642157 -0.1960784  0.0318627
#> ...           ...        ...        ...
#> gene50 -0.2867647  0.1176471  0.1691176
#> gene6   0.0906863  0.0686275 -0.1593137
#> gene7   0.2573529 -0.3970588  0.1397059
#> gene8   0.0367647 -0.4264706  0.3897059
#> gene9   0.0269608  0.0343137 -0.0612745
getStats(limma_output)

#> DataFrame with 50 rows and 3 columns
#>                 a         b          c
#>         <numeric> <numeric>  <numeric>
#> gene1  -0.2433458 -0.683761   1.017951
#> gene10 -0.3208615  1.404245  -1.147546
#> gene11 -0.0135653  0.516167  -0.541115
#> gene12  1.1544686 -2.027285   0.859346
#> gene13 -2.1045738  0.136555   2.248960

#> gene8   -0.447835  0.891062 -0.4506820
#> gene9   -0.434041  0.916261 -0.4866875
